definition: used of riotously drunken merrymaking, a wild gathering involving excessive drinking and promiscuity
details:
adjective
- used of riotously drunken merrymaking
= example: used of riotously drunken merrymaking
= synonyms: bacchanalian
noun
- a wild gathering involving excessive drinking and promiscuity
= synonyms: orgy
- a drunken reveller
= synonyms: bacchant
- someone who engages in drinking bouts
= synonyms: bacchant, drunken reveler, drunken reveller
